name: Swapped Finance
description: Swapped Finance is the leading decentralized exchange on Shardeum Blockchain that offers a secure and fair platform for trading digital assets. Its auto-scalability feature allows it to handle high levels of activity without delays or high fees, and its protection against front-running ensures a level playing field for all users. It is a unique option for those looking to trade on a decentralized exchange with best-of-class security, fees, available assets, and user experience.
